contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Belgium Municipality |name=Hoeilaart |picture=HoeilaartGemeentehuis.jpg |picture-legend=Hoeilaart Town Hall |map=HoeilaartLocatie.png |map-legend=Location of Hoeilaart in Flemish Brabant |arms=Hoeilaartwapen.gif |flag=Hoeilaartvlag.svg |region={{BE-REG-FLE}} |community={{BE-NL}} |province={{BE-PROV-VB}} |arrondissement=[[Halle-Vilvoorde administrative Arrondissement|Halle-Vilvoorde]] |nis=23033 |pyramid-date= |0-19= |20-64= |65= |foreigners= |foreigners-date= |mayor=Tim Vandenput (VLD) |majority=[[VLD]], PW |postal-codes=1560 |telephone-area=02 |web=[http://www.hoeilaart.be/ www.hoeilaart.be] |lat_deg=50 |lat_min=46 |lon_deg=04 |lon_min=28 }} '''Hoeilaart''' is a [[municipality]] in the province of [[Flemish Brabant]], in [[Flanders]], one of the three regions of [[Belgium]]. The name Hoeilaart is of [[Gauls|Gallic]]-[[Celtic languages|Celtic]] origin, coming from "Ho-Lar," meaning a high clearing in the woods. Residents are called Hoeilanders or Doenders. The municipality only comprises the town of Hoeilaart proper. On January 1, 2006 Hoeilaart had a total population of 10,074. The total area is 20.43 km² which gives a [[population density]] of 493 inhabitants per km². Hoeilaart also sometimes called "The Glass Village" because of the greenhouse grape cultivation that once took place. The official language is [[Dutch language|Dutch]]. Local minorities consist of nationals from many [[European union]]-countries, [[United States|USA]] and [[Canada]], and from French-speakers. ==Sightseeing== *Woodland Museum Jan van Ruusbroec *Neo-Romanesque Church dating from 1870-1874 *[[Kasteel de Man]] *"Serristenvillas" from the 1920s *Smeyberghoeve *The old millhouse of the [[Groenendael Priory]] <gallery> Image:Hoeilaart station - 10.JPG|<center>Old tram station of Hoeilaart with [[The Adventures of Nero|Nero]] statue </gallery> ==Famous inhabitants== * [[Jan van Ruusbroec]] (1291-1381), one of the greatest mystics of the southern Netherlands. * [[Armand Pien]], weather forecaster on Flemish TV * [[Marc Sleen]], [[Franco-Belgian comics|comics]] artist, author of [[The Adventures of Nero|Nero]] * [[:nl:Jaak Pijpen|Jaak Pijpen]], televisiepersoonlijkheid, advocaat, hoofdredacteur en politieker * [[Walter Baele]] ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www.hoeilaart.be Official website ] - Only available in [[Dutch language|Dutch]] {{Flemish Brabant}} [[Category:Municipalities of Flemish Brabant]] {{FlemishBrabant-geo-stub}}
